scripts.install: npm --prefix types install && npm --prefix server install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix client install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: concurrently "npm --prefix client run build" "npm --prefix server run build"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm --prefix client run lint" "npm --prefix server run lint"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm --prefix server run test" "npm --prefix client run test:e2e"
